the bottom of the hat measures 21 inches ending on row 2 do not cut yarn now refer to assembling the hat easy ribbed hat by dinique diane wilks © 2019 assembling the hat fold the hat by bringing the starting row to the front of the last row this will be easier to create an invisible stitch for the seam sewing the seam back loop of half_double_crochet chain 1 does not count as a stitch insert hook into bottom of starting chain as shown above find the back loop of the half_double_crochet of the last row and single_crochet as shown below continue to single_crochet in this way the whole way down the seam because you are using the back loop of the half_double_crochet this will form an invisible seam on the right side of the hat as an alternative to single crocheting down the seam cut a long tail and use your tapestry needle to sew the seam together note that if you use the back loops of the last row you will still have an invisible seam on the right side of the hat easy ribbed hat by dinique diane wilks © 2019 cinching the top of the hat after you have crocheted/sewn the seam together there will be a small hole at the top of the hat as shown below you should have a tail from the magic_ring and one from the seam pull the tail from the magic_ring to close the hole tie both tails together tightly to secure and sew in the ends when you turn the hat right side out you will see a nice neat tapered top to the hat as shown below easy ribbed hat by dinique diane wilks © 2019 adding a pom pom if you wish to make your own faux fur pom pom you can find my free guide on my website
